subject: RE: [junit] Multi-threaded testing w/ Junit?
msgSnippet: BTW in  order for the test to succeed you ll probably have to block the test thread to wait for the spawned threads. (w/ Thread.currentThread().sleep(...))
messageBody:
BTW in order for the test to succeed you'll probably have to block the test
thread to wait for the spawned threads. (w/
Thread.currentThread().sleep(...))

Mark

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Taylor [mailto:jeff@...]

Subject: [junit] Multi-threaded testing w/ Junit?
